name: Boobastic Mansion Maze
description:
2-4 players

30+ minutes

Cooperative survival digital card game

It’s Halloween!

You and your friends are out trick-or-treating. You all come across a spooky mansion and are looking for candy, your group decides to enter the mansion. Unfortunately the mansion traps you inside and now your group of friends are lost inside with ghosts! Traverse the mansion while keeping yourself and your friends alive.
